title: Nosleep Podcast #1
description:
Welcome to the inaugural episode of The Nosleep Podcast! Featuring stories from the No Sleep forum at Reddit.com, these stories will send a shiver down your spine while the dark night hours beckon you to try to sleep.
Our first podcast features two stories:
The Stairs and the Doorway written by Eric Dodd (Redditor Unxmaal) and read by David Cummings (Redditor MikeRowPhone)
The Midnight Man written by V. Rusanovsky (Redditor VermilionSky) and read by Alex Beal (Redditor Alexthehoopy).
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

Welcome to the inaugural episode of The Nosleep Podcast! Featuring stories from the No Sleep forum at Reddit.com, these stories will send a shiver down your spine while the dark night hours beckon you to try to sleep.

Our first podcast features two stories:

The Stairs and the Doorway written by Eric Dodd (Redditor Unxmaal) and read by David Cummings (Redditor MikeRowPhone)

The Midnight Man written by V. Rusanovsky (Redditor VermilionSky) and read by Alex Beal (Redditor Alexthehoopy).
